lead_paragraph: Blackhawks coach Joel Quenneville thought about playing rookie goalie Lars Johansson against the San Jose Sharks on Sunday night. Then Scott Darling said he wanted to make his ninth straight start, and the debate was over.

headline.print_headline: Blackhawks Beat Sharks 4-1 for 5th Straight Win
headline.main: Blackhawks Beat Sharks 4-1 for 5th Straight Win
